languages.text: "А уж что там происходит за пределами планеты — вообще никто не знает. На Райкади Филии, тюремном планетоиде, был бунт. Станция Эурак-V молчит, но тамошние навигаторы и раньше затворниками держались. Я надеялся, что мне повезет перехватить тут пилота или капитана со свежими новостями... Но где уж — все, что заходит на посадку, повстанцы разносят из своей проклятой пушки".

"And who even knows what's happening in the system. There's been a riot on Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid. Eurac V Station is silent, although, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or captain here who could give me an update, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that tries to land out of the sky with their damn cannon."
languages.original_text: "А уж что там происходит за пределами планеты — вообще никто не знает. На Райкади Филии, тюремном планетоиде, был бунт. Станция Эурак-V молчит, но тамошние навигаторы и раньше затворниками держались. Я надеялся, что мне повезет перехватить тут пилота или капитана со свежими новостями... Но где уж — все, что заходит на посадку, повстанцы разносят из своей проклятой пушки".

traits.locale_text: "And who even knows what's happening in the system. There's been a riot on Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid. Eurac-V Station is silent, but, well, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or a captain here who could update me on things, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that's trying to land with their damn cannon."

"And who even knows what's happening in the system. There's been a riot on Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid. Eurac-V Station is silent, but, well, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or a captain here who could update me on things, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that's trying to land with their damn cannon."

Eurac V Station is silent, although, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or the captain here who could give me an update, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that's trying to land from their damn cannon."

Eurac V Station is silent, although, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or captain here who could give me an update, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that tries to land out of the sky with their damn cannon."

languages.text: "Und wer weiß, was im System vor sich geht. Auf dem Gefängnisplanetoiden Rykadi Philia gab es einen Aufstand. Die Station Eurac V ist stumm ... wobei die Navigatoren schon immer ein sehr verschwiegener Haufen waren. Ich hatte gehofft, hier einen Piloten oder Captain zu treffen und sie mir etwas Neues sagen können, aber ... das kann ich jetzt wohl vergessen. Die Rebellen schießen mit ihrer verfluchten Kanone alles vom Himmel, was zu landen versucht."
languages.original_text: "And who even knows what's happening in the system. There's been a riot on Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid. Eurac V Station is silent, although, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or captain here who could give me an update, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that tries to land out of the sky with their damn cannon."

traits.locale_text: "Und wer weiß, was im System vor sich geht. Auf dem Gefängnisplanetoiden Rykadi Philia gab es einen Aufstand. Die Station Eurac V ist stumm ... wobei die Navigatoren schon immer ein sehr verschwiegener Haufen waren. Ich hatte gehofft, hier einen Piloten oder Captain zu treffen und sie mir etwas Neues sagen können, aber ... das kann ich jetzt wohl vergessen. Die Rebellen schießen mit ihrer verfluchten Kanone alles vom Himmel, was zu landen versucht."

"Und wer weiß, was anderswo im System vor sich geht. Auf dem Gefängnisplanetoiden Rykadi Philia gab es einen Aufstand. Die Station Eurac V ist stumm ... wobei die Navigatoren schon immer ein sehr verschwiegener Haufen waren. Ich hatte gehofft, dass ich hier einen Piloten oder den Captain treffe und sie mir etwas Neues sagen können, aber ... das kann ich jetzt wohl vergessen. Die Rebellen schießen mit ihrer verfluchten Kanone alles vom Himmel, was zu landen versucht."

languages.text: « Et allez savoir ce qui se passe dans le système... Il y a eu une émeute sur Rykadi Philia, le planétoïde carcéral, la station Eurac-V ne répond plus, même s'il est vrai que les navigateurs ont toujours été du genre taciturne. J'espérais avoir suffisamment de chance pour croiser ici un pilote ou un capitaine capable de me mettre au parfum, mais il ne faut plus trop y compter... Les rebelles font sauter tout ce qui tente d'atterrir avec leur maudit canon. »
languages.original_text: "And who even knows what's happening in the system. There's been a riot on Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid. Eurac V Station is silent, although, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or captain here who could give me an update, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that tries to land out of the sky with their damn cannon."

traits.locale_text: « Et allez savoir ce qui se passe dans le système... Il y a eu une émeute sur Rykadi Philia, le planétoïde carcéral, la station Eurac V ne répond plus, même s'il est vrai que les navigateurs ont toujours été du genre taciturne. J'espérais avoir suffisamment de chance pour croiser ici un pilote ou un capitaine capable de me mettre au parfum, mais il ne faut plus trop y compter... Les rebelles font sauter tout ce qui tente d'atterrir avec leur maudit canon. »

languages.text: “没人知道这个星系到底发生了什么事情。监狱星莱卡德菲利亚发生了暴乱，欧拉克五号星站陷入静默，虽然那里的导航者一直都不爱说话。我本希望能幸运地遇到某位飞行员或舰长，给我带来最新的消息，可是……这种事情如今恐怕指望不上了。叛军那边有一门防空炮，只要有哪艘飞船打算着陆，就会被一炮打下来。”
languages.original_text: "And who even knows what's happening in the system. There's been a riot on Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid. Eurac V Station is silent, although, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or captain here who could give me an update, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that tries to land out of the sky with their damn cannon."

traits.locale_text: “没人知道这个星系到底发生了什么事情。监狱星莱卡德菲利亚发生了暴乱，欧拉克五号星陷入静默，虽然那里的导航者一直都不爱说话。我本希望能幸运地遇到某位飞行员或舰长，给我带来最新的消息，可是……这种事情如今恐怕指望不上了。叛军那边有一门防空炮，只要有哪艘飞船打算着陆，就会被一炮打下来。”
“没人知道这个星系到底发生了什么事情。监狱星莱卡德菲利亚发生了暴乱，欧拉克五号星站陷入静默，虽然那里的导航者一直都不爱说话。我本希望能幸运地遇到某位飞行员或舰长，给我带来最新的消息，可是……这种事情如今恐怕指望不上了。叛军那边有一门防空炮，只要有哪艘飞船打算着陆，就会被一炮打下来。”

languages.text: 「それに、この星系で何が起きているのか誰にも分からないでしょう。監獄小惑星、ライカディ・フィリアでは暴動が起きています。ユーラック・Vのステーションは沈黙しているにもかかわらず、航宙士は相変わらず表に出てきません。最新の情報を教えてくれる操縦士や船長に運よくここで会えれば、と思っていたのですが…今ではとても無理な話です。ふざけたことに、暴徒が大砲で着陸しようとするものは何でもかんでも吹き飛ばしてますから」
languages.original_text: "And who even knows what's happening in the system. There's been a riot on Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid. Eurac V Station is silent, although, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or captain here who could give me an update, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that tries to land out of the sky with their damn cannon."

traits.locale_text: 「神聖電力連生体は、この星系で起きていることを知るべくもないでしょう。監獄小惑星、ライカディ・フィリアでは暴動が起きています。ユーラック・Vのステーションは沈黙しているにもかかわらず、航宙士は相変わらず表に出てきません。最新の情報を教えてくれる操縦士や船長に運よくここで会えれば、と思っていたのですが…今ではとても無理な話です。ふざけたことに、暴徒が大砲で何でもかんでも吹き飛ばしてますから」

「それに、この星系で何が起きているのか誰にも分からないでしょう。監獄小惑星、ライカディ・フィリアでは暴動が起きています。ユーラック・Vのステーションは沈黙しているにもかかわらず、航宙士は相変わらず表に出てきません。最新の情報を教えてくれる操縦士や船長に運よくここで会えれば、と思っていたのですが…今ではとても無理な話です。ふざけたことに、暴徒が大砲で着陸しようとするものは何でもかんでも吹き飛ばしてますから」

languages.text: «Y quién sabe lo que pasa en el sistema. Ha habido un motín en Rykadi Philia, el planetoide prisión. La estación Eurac V está tranquila, aunque los navegantes siempre han sido un grupo solitario. Esperaba tener la suerte de toparme con algún piloto o capitán que pudiera ponerme al día, pero... no es una posibilidad ahora mismo. Los rebeldes están derribando con ese maldito cañón a todo lo que intenta aterrizar».
languages.original_text: "And who even knows what's happening in the system. There's been a riot on Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid. Eurac V Station is silent, although, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or captain here who could give me an update, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that tries to land out of the sky with their damn cannon."

traits.locale_text: «Y quién sabe lo que pasa en el sistema. Ha habido un motín en Rykadi Philia, el planetoide prisión. La estación Eurac V está tranquila, aunque los navegantes siempre han sido un grupo solitario. Esperaba tener la suerte de toparme con algún piloto o capitán que pudiera ponerme al día, pero... no es una posibilidad ahora mismo. Los rebeldes están derribando con ese maldito cañón a todo lo que intenta aterrizar».

languages.text: "Sistemin diğer yerlerinde neler oluyor kim bilir? Cezaevi cüce gezegeni Rykadi Philia'da isyan çıkmış. Eurac V İstasyonu'ndan ses seda yok, gerçi Rotacılar hep içine kapanık tiplerdi zaten. Talih yüzüme güler de son bilgileri verebilecek bir pilot ya da kaptana rastlarım diye umuyordum ama... Belli ki olacağı yok. İsyancılar, gökten inmeye kalkışan her şeyi o lanet toplarıyla patlatıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "And who even knows what's happening in the system. There's been a riot on Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid. Eurac V Station is silent, although, the Navigators there have always been a reclusive bunch. I was hoping I'd be lucky enough to run into a pilot or captain here who could give me an update, but... that's hardly a possibility right now — the rebels are blasting anything that tries to land out of the sky with their damn cannon."
